text:
National Officers
LEO A. MARTIN, President; Head,
Radio and Television Instruction,
Michigan State University.
EDWARD STASHEFF, First Vice-
President; professor of speech, Uni¬
versity of Michigan, Ann Arbor.

Second Vice-President; radio-TV edu¬
cation specialist. U. S. Office of Edu¬
cation, Washington, D. C.

sociate director, Wisconsin School of
the Air, University of Wisconsin,
Madison.

surer; manager, Station WUSV, Uni¬
versity of Scranton, Pennsylvania.

nity Relations, Philadelphia, Pennsylva¬

Each volume of the JOURNAL beginning with volume 9 is available on microfilm
from University Microfilms, 313 North First Street, Ann Arbor, Michigan.
NOVEMBER 1956
